de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.session.statemachine

Interface StateHelper<T extends TnccsContentHandler>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the helper type based on its content handler (e.g. TNCC -> TNCC content handler)
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStateHelper, DefaultClientStateHelper, DefaultServerStateHelper

    public interface StateHelper<T extends TnccsContentHandler>
    Generic helper to make information and commonly used functions accessible to a TNC(C/S) state.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.attribute.Attributed getAttributes()
      Returns accessible session and/or connection attributes.
      T getHandler()
      Returns the content handler to handle messages.
      State getState(TnccsStateEnum stateEnum)
      Returns a state for the given state enumeration value.
